messages.subject: A History of US
messages.msgSnippet: This was forwarded to me and I thought I d pass it along.  My daughter really enjoys these books, especially as reference when she sees something interesting
messages.messageBody:
This was forwarded to me and I thought I'd pass it along. My daughter
really enjoys these books, especially as reference when she sees something
interesting related on tv. She's really in to history right now! Maybe
some of you could use these!!

Jennifer

I just found Joy Hakim's complete 10 volume *hardcover* A History of US
set
at 73% off!

The most recent update is the 3rd edition, April 2003 (it brings the
series
up-to-date to include September 11th and events since then) so
Amazon.com
is selling the 2nd edition sets at an incredible 73% off! Quantities are
limited and may sell out very quickly!

The list price on this 2nd edition set is $219.45 and Amazon is now
selling
it for $58.16 plus $6.88 for shipping!

To order, click here
<http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect-home/valerieslivin-20>http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect-home/valerieslivin-20
and enter the following ISBN in the search box:
0195127730
